verses.name: Mark 6:32
verses.text: And they departed into a desert place by ship privately.

verses.name: Mark 6:33
verses.text: And the people saw them departing, and many knew him, and ran afoot thither out of all cities, and outwent them, and came together unto him.

verses.name: Mark 6:34
verses.text: And Jesus, when he came out, saw much people, and was moved with compassion toward them, because they were as sheep not having a shepherd: and he began to teach them many things.

verses.name: Mark 6:35
verses.text: And when the day was now far spent, his disciples came unto him, and said, This is a desert place, and now the time is far passed:
